title: Drew Brees to miss significant time following thumb surgery, Browns-Jets MNF Preview (Football 9/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to react to reports that Drew Brees will miss at least 6 weeks following thumb surgery for an injury he suffered Sunday vs the Rams (1:00). Will and Jared then break down tonight's Monday Night Football clash between the Browns and Jets (9:00). Next, Jason La Canfora joins the podcast (21:00) to discuss kicking woes across the league, officiating mishaps, the Bears and the state of the NFC North (31:00), a solid start to the career of Kyler Murray, the injuries to Ben Roethlisberger and Drew Brees (44:30), the status of Sam Darnold (51:00) and the future for the Dolphins (52:30). 
*Note: This podcast was recorded Monday morning before news of Ben Roethlisberger's season-ending injury.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
